comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Here is the impressive Brand Whitlock's article on Wikipedia. Based on the biographical information there, this is likely before 1913 (at which time he was appointed the minister to Belgium) and his wife is probably Nell Brainerd.

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Thanks, bior, for supplying the name of Whitlock's wife. Turns out that Nell is a nickname for Ella. We'll add it to the record next time we update.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: He had returned to America in late November, 1915 for health reasons, so this may be from the same visit. See notes under , taken on their arrival in New York.
